column5: Hello  Would anyone be intersted in going fishing one or all the 3 next days.  I am open to fishing pretty much anyting. (trout, walleye, pike, panfish etc etc)  I have tons of fly fishing gear and Regular gear.  IF interested I have 2 fishing kayaks that we could use.  Small trout stream access to private water.  I am located in Oshawa and willing to meet up somewhere close.   If you have a boat I am willing to split costs.  Let me know via pm's or give and leave a message on the home phone (289) 240-6313  Dave
Thats an awsome invite Dave , to far for me to go tho  , but if your ever wanting to try Lake Simcoe i'd be more then glad to return the invite .
Fishing tomorrow for PIke from the Kayak,  Tuesday, wed still open,  Fly fishing for resident or kayak fishing for walleyes or pike,,  PM me  dave
What happens if someone contacts you who doesn't have a car?
Let me know when your available and lets fish.  I have a van that is being repaired (accident yesterday) but most of the time I have a vechile
Guy you're killing me right now!!  LOL
That's a nice offer Dave, hope someone took you up on it... Could learn a lot from you. How'd you make out?
